title: Never Been to Mars
description: My name is Benedict Thompson and I’m a superhero.I’m not a great superhero. I’m not super strong, I can’t fly or climb walls and I barely walk without a cane, but I have a kick-ass cowboy hat and the psychic ability to read an item’s past. With a single touch I know everything about an item, where it came from, how it was made and what it’s been through. I know it all whether I want to or not.Now imagine touching that pen at work and in a flash seeing how it was made and every person who used it.Now imagine tying up your sneakers and in a flash seeing every overseas sweatshop laborer working to make your new pair of kicks.Now imagine lying down on that hotel bed and in a flash seeing every —– wait, you better just skip that one.Cowboy hat, cane, and psychic powers; that’s all it takes.Long live the cowboy.
author: Larry Gent
